directors.name: Nick Winston
directors.nationality: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland (the)

synopsis.native: The musical follows the relationships of what at first seems like two different couples separated by a span of time; one couple is getting married and the other is getting divorced. It turns out they are actually the same couple at two points in their relationship-a decade apart.
